name: War Car - Crash Arena
description:
War Car - Crash Arena is simple yet full of car crashes, traffic accidents and insane stunts that are extreme in nature and take demolition derby to the next level carnage and destruction. In the beginning the car crashed will not impact you as much when you encounter a traffic accident or a car crash accident or even a road accident but as you progress through the levels, your rivals keep getting better and stronger which results in more car crash traffic accidents and a higher impact on your health
Features:
• Two amazing modes for maximum car crashing thrill!
• 8 Amazing Car Textures to choose from.
• Super Cool Visual and Sound Effects.
• Awesome 3D Graphics.
• Realistic car crash physics with smooth controls.
